title: (x) Help, - (similar to) Letter Gothic {Gerardo}
content:
Looks like Trade Gothik or Letter Gothic L Medium... But I know it is a free font, which font is this and where could I possibly find it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131221141257im_/http:/typophile.com/files/billia_4035.gif)

Thanks.
author: Panda

comments.content:
Looks like

ITC Officina Sans LT Book

Hope that helps!

John

FontGear Inc.  
 [www.FontGear.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20131221141257/http:/www.fontgear.net/ "www.FontGear.net")  
blog.FontGear.net
No, the Officina Sans samples I'm seeing have a splayed M and shorter figures.

I think Letter Gothic is the more similar...

[http://www.fonts.com/ES/detail.htm?pid=205805](http://web.archive.org/web/20131221141257/http:/www.fonts.com/ES/detail.htm?pid=205805 "http://www.fonts.com/ES/detail.htm?pid=205805")

It's not a free font as I was told, but I'll go with it.

Thank you guys for your help.
